name: Tornado Runner
description:
A endless runner where a tornado is chasing you

Controls: arrows to walk and jump esc to pause

Ps. There was a bug in the build to WebGL that makes it that the game crashes when you die. To play the working version download the windows file unzip that file and run Brackeys game jam.exe.

Programming: Unusedname

Art: SkynightPilot

Game idea:Shy79
